          <title>
            <string language="en">Nucleophilic addition of HCN to ethanal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nukleophile Hinzufügung von HCN zum ethanal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ajout nucléophile de HCN à l'ethanal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adição nucleophilic do HCN ao ethanal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aggiunta nucleofila di HCN al ethanal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυρηνόφιλη προσθήκη HCN στο ethanal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Adición nucleophilic del HCN al ethanal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the mechanism of nucleophilic addition of HCN to ethanal catalysed by a base.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Einheit der nukleophilen
Hinzufügung von HCN zum ethanal, das durch eine Unterseite 
katalysiert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le mécanisme de l'ajout
nucléophile du HCN à l'ethanal catalysé par une base.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o mecanismo da adição 
nucleophilic do HCN ao ethanal catalysed por uma base.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il meccanismo 
dell'aggiunta nucleofila di HCN al ethanal catalizzato da una base.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το μηχανισμό της 
πυρηνόφιλης προσθήκης HCN στο ethanal που καταλύεται από μια
βάση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el mecanismo de la 
adición nucleophilic del HCN al ethanal catalizado por una base.</string>
